name: mikroe.click.ipd2
short_description: IPD 2 Click is a compact add-on board for efficient and reliable high-side switching in automotive applications. This board features the BV2HD070EFU-C, an automotive-grade two-channel high-side switch from ROHM Semiconductor with advanced protection and diagnostic functionalities. This 70mÎ© on-resistance high-side switch supports an input voltage range from 6V to 28V and includes built-in protection mechanisms such as overcurrent detection, thermal shutdown, undervoltage lockout, and open load detection. Additionally, it offers configurable overcurrent limits and diagnostic output for real-time fault feedback, ensuring enhanced system reliability.
